info: T means true, F means False. If no publications, just leave the publication structure unchanged.
name: Mark W. Westneat

publications.text: Anderson, P. S. L. and M. W. Westneat. 2007. Feeding mechanics and bite force modelling of the skull of Dunkleosteus terrelli, an ancient apex predator. Biology Letters. 3, 76–79. (PubMed)
